alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broward County through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, or 10 miles west of Sunrise, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
